mapper.sql: update sys_user_tab set is_del = 'Y' where user_id = #{user_id}
update sys_room_tab set room_state = 0 where id = #{r_id}
update sys_room_tab set room_state = 1 where id = #{r_id}

select count(distinct sut.user_id)
select (@i:=@i+1) num,a.* from ( select sut.`user_id`, sut.`user_name`, sut.`user_tel`, sut.`phone`, sut.`id_no`, sut.`sex`, sut.`addr`, sut.`email`, sut.`remark`, sut.`housing_area`, sut.`inside_area`, sut.`house_type`, sut.`create_date`, sut.`work`, sut.`work_tel`, sut.`is_move_in`, sut.in_room_id, sut.`move_addr`, date_format(sut.`move_in_time`, '%Y-%m-%d') `move_in_time`, sut.`formalities`, sut.`decoration`, sut.`is_move_out`, date_format(sut.`move_out_time`, '%Y-%m-%d') `move_out_time`, sut.`move_out_reason`, sut.`is_del`
from sys_user_tab sut where 1=1
and sut.user_name LIKE '%${columns[0][search][value]}%'
and sut.id_no LIKE '%${columns[1][search][value]}%'
and sut.phone LIKE '%${columns[2][search][value]}%'
and sut.is_move_in = 1
and sut.is_move_out = 1
and sut.move_out_time_start = '${columns[4][search][value]}'
and sut.move_out_time_end = '${columns[5][search][value]}'
and sut.is_move_in = 0
order by sut.create_date desc limit ${page_start},${page_end} ) a,(select @i:= ${page_start} ) it
